sentences: Nan Yik-Pong, better known by his stage name Pong Nan (Chinese: 藍奕邦, 蓝奕邦; born 15 May 1978), is a Cantopop musician, singer-songwriter and actor in Hong Kong of Hakka ancestry.
section: N/A

section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: In 1989, amid mass migrations due to unclear handover situation to China situation, at the age of 11, Nan and his family immigrated to Canada.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: In 1993, Nan returned to Hong Kong and entered La Salle College to continue his studies until Form Six.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: Then he studied international politics and culture at Georgetown University in Washington, D.C., United States.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: He went to Waseda University in Japan for exchange in Year 3.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: After graduation in 2000, he returned to Hong Kong and worked as an office salesperson, while being a part-time musician for Harbour City and Fringe Club.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: During this time, he released some of his music online via MP3.com, and he composed Sound from Above 樓上來的聲音 for Jacky Cheung and Mad about You for Joey Yung.
section: == Life and career == | === 1978–2004: Early life and career beginnings ===

sentences: He was also the lyricist for Yung's Hill of Memories 舊日回憶的山丘.

sentences: 2012 and 2013 were considered relatively successful period for Nan, as his digital single Cheers 為執著乾杯, released in 2012 summer, received his first ever number-one in the music charts (903 and TVB).
section: == Life and career == | === 2012–13: Grace and Beauty 優與美 ===

sentences: The song encouraged positive thinking and more importantly highlighted his challenges against all the criticisms through his musical career.
section: == Life and career == | === 2012–13: Grace and Beauty 優與美 ===

sentences: The song was even used as one theme song in the September protests against Moral and national education after release.
section: == Life and career == | === 2012–13: Grace and Beauty 優與美 ===

sentences: Besides, retro electro You Are So London, I Am So New York 你倫敦，我紐約 and piano based Let's go to Alaska 一起去阿拉斯加 also went top of the charts.
section: == Life and career == | === 2012–13: Grace and Beauty 優與美 ===

sentences: In May 2014, Nan took part in 903 id club concert with Miriam Yeung, Alfred Hui and Adason Lo.

sentences: Afterwards, he joined Cinepoly to mark his 10th anniversary of career in June.

sentences: Nan participated his company debut concert Universal Music Summer Hits Concert with fellow singers Eric Suen, Kary Ng, Kelvin Kwan in late June.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: At the same time, Nan released his debut song Love me then Kiss me 愛我就吻我.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: It became a hit and reached top three in RTHK, 903 and Metro charts.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: Subsequently, Nan held his personal debut concert Soliton Presents Pong Nan CARESS Live in August 2014 which he performed songs of his upcoming first Cinepoly album Caress 撫愛.

sentences: Kary Ng appeared as a guest singer.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: The album was released later in September.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: Caress 撫愛 is Nan's first ever love album, which marked his change in personal thinking.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: He decided to embrace love, an aspect he was afraid to talk about before.
section: == Life and career == | === 2014–present: Marking 10 years of singer career – Cinepoly and Caress 撫愛 ===

sentences: His another song of the album, Lover 戀人, topped TVB, 903 and Metro charts, his first record in his 10-year career.

sentences: Besides, it was successfully acclaimed by critics as well as commercially popular with over 10,000 copies sold in 3 months.

sentences: It was then certified as gold record by HKRIA.
